usefulItems: heatproof freezer bag, frying pan, freezer, hob
title: Turkey Burger

ingredients.content: 450 g turkey breast, skinless, cut in long thin strips (3 cm)

preparations.content: Line mixing bowl with a freezer proof bag. Weigh turkey into bag and place in freezer for 1 hour.
Place coriander in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add onions, partially frozen turkey, cumin, salt,  ginger and cayenne pepper then mince <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>.
Divide mixture into 4 balls then, using wet hands, flatten to form burgers (Ø 10 cm).
Heat oil in a large frying pan and fry burgers over a medium heat for 3-4 minutes on each side until cooked through. Serve hot in a bun of your choice.

hintsAndTricks: This burger is great served with fresh tomato and mayonnaise.
